name: Hakai Ocean Sovereignty
text: Main Don!!: If your leader's type has {Animal Kingdom Pirates} or {Big Mom Pirates} in it, KO up to two of your opponents cost 6 or lower characters.

effect.text: If your leader's type has {Animal Kingdom Pirates} or {Big Mom Pirates} in it, KO up to two of your opponents cost 6 or lower characters.

meta.notes: Card is marked as a SAMPLE, but this is not a valid card for gameplay. The printed ID is OP08-077, set is OP08, number is 77, rarity is C, and the text is as printed.
